Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.model.cards

Class GoldenCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.model.cards.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.model.cards.ResourceCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.model.cards.GoldenCard
public class GoldenCard extends ResourceCard
This class is used to represent cards that give points It is similar to ResourceCard but with some requirements and benefits

      info - for the card
      corners - map of corners
      color - of the card
      score - of the card
      requirements - to play the card

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(Player player, Position position)
      Parameters:
      player - for whom to calculate the points earned after placing the golden card in his field.
      position - on which the golden card has been played.
      Returns:
      number of points earned after placing the golden card
